description: Led reviews with stakeholders and designers to determine technical feasibility of requirements.
Coached junior developers on best practices with ReactJS, Material-UI, Redux Toolkit.
Conducted code reviews to ensure code readability and maintainability.
Implemented route drawing and route simulation with ArcGIS JS.
Led and created a custom NPM library with Typescript, Rollup, and Material-UI to support the standardization of icons department-wide.
Worked alongside designers to roll out a React-based webpage demonstrating the usage of the icons library. The application supports downloading of icons in various formats, sizes, and colors.
Provided documentation on the maintenance, contribution guidelines, and usage of the NPM library to support InnerSource culture within the department.
Received DSTA Innovation Award 2023 (Individual) for the product.
Usage of SAC Analytics Application to provide data analytics for SAP’s Innovation team.
Creation and deployment of two React web applications with Azure Static Web App and Azure Functions for airport operations.
Successfully launched application for use by check-in staff at counters serviced by SATS.
Usage of GitHub for version control and deployment of application.
Creation of PDF readers to assist in SATS sustainability effort, reducing the need for manual data retrieval.
Worked closely with subject matter experts at SATS to draft up wireframes in Figma to optimize UI/UX.
Designed customer-facing website prototype using Figma, working closely with Supply Chain subject matter experts to optimize UI/UX of the application.
Presented application process flows to global teams, managing to sell the application to the team regarding the feasibility of the project.
Built full-stack application with custom API in Flask that served data to React front-end, achieving approximately 70% time reduction in supplier sourcing efforts.
Designed Executive Support System (ESS) with PowerBI, improving the visibility of department’s Corporate Social Responsibility efforts and reduced time spent on manual data cleansing by 80%.
Worked with a global team for data verification using Excel and Python across all departmental systems, improving team efficiency and productivity.
